title: @KateyKhaos, concerning Taliyah
body: You guys made a skateboarding teenager.  How is her launch skin not Totally Radical Taliyah?  Disappointing, really.

replies.body: Is the playerbase old enough in general to get the joke?

+1 This would be my concern, haha.

That said, it'd be a cool thematic to explore - even if we just used some inspiration from Jet Set Radio/Beat in general. :P

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=pcqchKkc,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2016-05-04T18:25:05.149+0000)
>
> +1 This would be my concern, haha.
> 
> That said, it'd be a cool thematic to explore - even if we just used some inspiration from Jet Set Radio/Beat in general. :P

...You just named my entire childhood.

*gets teary eyed* QnQ  *bows* I AM NOT WORTHY!!!
I may be showing my age here, hahaha.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=pcqchKkc,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2016-05-04T18:25:05.149+0000)
>
> +1 This would be my concern, haha.
> 
> That said, it'd be a cool thematic to explore - even if we just used some inspiration from Jet Set Radio/Beat in general. :P

Katey please do this. Bring my favorite game in to the league, Maybe you can get a couple more and release it as a new skin Line? Tali, Ekko, maybe a couple others.
Im expecting a summer skin with her on a surfboard as well.
but when is the irelia version of the skin gonna come as well
I'm older then most people that tend to play this (32) and I still don't get it :/

Harumph.  I'm old enough.
She needs a pool party skin. Just straight up pool party.
Every single champion in League needs a pool party skin.
